name: AE Video Poker
description:
Eight addictive modes, real Vegas casino feeling, AE Video Poker comes to your phone now!

Any feedback please emails us, because we can’t reply on comments. Thanks very much for all your support in our games!


Eight Video Poker Machines let you choose. Try your best to unlock all the game modes.

* Jacks or Better – the classic, 5 coins multiplier

* Tens or Better - minimum paying hand is a pair of tens, 10 coins multiplier

* All American - based on Jacks or Better with an increased payout for flushes, 15 coins multiplier

* Aces and Eights – adds bonuses for four aces, eights, and sevens; 20 coins multiplier

* Deuces Wild –all twos are wild, 25 coins multiplier

* Bonus Deuces – similar with Deuces Wild but more bonuses, 30 coins multiplier

* Double Bonus - a variation of Jacks or Better with a bonus payout for four aces, 50 coins multiplier

* Double Double Bonus - offers bonus payoffs for different four of a kinds, 80 coins multiplier


Graceful design and realistic game feeling makes you just like in Las Vegas Casinos, which will give you a real and addictive gambling experience.

Play Video Poker with real world paytables. Bet max to win the Jackpot!

Each game has auto hold that can avoid discard of winning hands.

Special bonus and experience exchange will give you extra income.

If you like Slot Machine, Solitaire, Spider, Roulette, Baccarat, UNO, Texas Poker, Card Ace: Casino, Blackjack, dice and other card and casino games, you shouldn’t miss this game!

Let’s enjoy the fun of the game!
